structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 435, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1946 Ky. Acts ch. 148, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3495, 3506, 3629a-2, 3629a-6.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Powers of chief of police and policemen -- Fees -- Deputies -- Special police.
